metadata.name: Kintsugi #0
metadata.description:
"Broken is beautiful."

Evoking inspiration from the Japanese art of Kintsugi this avant-garde collection subverts expectations, examining the relationship between self and ambition, wholeness, strength and the false value of acquiring precious metals.

Kintsugi is the Kohi platform genesis collection and a technical test to prove our approach for on-chain generative art. The Kintsugi collection is generated entirely on-chain in Solidity using our in-house compiler.

To learn more about the Kohi platform and our on-chain approach, please visit https://kohi.art/mission.
